title: "Jhin has strong and clear weaknesses"
body:
I don't ADC very often, but I keep hearing this statement.

Anyone care to further elaborate?


He doesn't have low range, his skills hit harder than most marksmen, his autos hit harder than most marksmen.. 


I rarely see them lose trades because his damage combo has decent range, click to target and no delay.

Doesn't really have an issue with melee that I see, permanent ghost from passive makes that easy.


combine this with the fact he doesnt even enter a fight, he just ults the squishies 100-0 and then cleans up... what is this apparent weakness?


Add the stupid abusal of lethality to the mix and you have a canerous growth on the champ roster.

EDIT: Not a QQ.. Legimate question..

replies.body:
Weak to aggressiver divers, but his play pattern doesn't usually open him up to them.

Jhin can stay out of auto attack range and be productive, unlike most adc

Hmmm. Have you tried hitting him? He usually dies from that.

More seriously, unlike a lot of ADCs, he has no instant CC. He has to set his up.

Therefore if you flank him and jump on him, he's toast.

But that isn't an issue when you have someone like Thresh sitting next to you permanently..


Unlike a lot of ADCS?

Corki, Ezreal, Caitlyn, Draven, Graves, Jinx, Kogmaw, Lucian, MF,Sivir, Twitch have no instant (hard) CC

Of the remaining 7, Ashe, Varus, Kalista, Tristana use their ultimate, Vayne needs a wall.

Most marksmen don't have CC. That isn't exactly a weakness.

Like Rubick said, all of his long range skills can be bodyblocked.

And if he tries to be cute and only contribute to a teamfight via ult from miles away, collapse on his team 4v5 and murder them.

1. Takes time to charge/land cc
2. him ulting will make him a sitting duck to whoever
3. his reload mechanic also makes him a sitting duck.
4. it takes the 4th shot to get the movement speed passive, or have spent a decent amount of time ingame to get crit chance item to only give him a better chance for more movement speed( not garunteed unless you get 100%)
5. squishy like all other adcs
6. You cant use the saying that the support keeps him safe because that argument is valid with all adcs/whatever is being used in botlane/

There's a couple more but no point in saying, i think you get the point by now.
